keywords.Asimov: <abbr title="Creatures possessing this trait cannot attack or defend against creatures with the Human subtype.">Asimov</abbr>
keywords.Changeling: <abbr title="This creature possesses all creature subtypes simultaneously. Any effects which affect a specific subtype apply to Changelings.">Changeling</abbr>
keywords.Graytide: <abbr title="When this creature enters the battlefield, it gains +1/+1 for the number of creatures on your side of the field with Graytide, until the end of the turn.">Graytide</abbr>
keywords.Taunt: <abbr title="All opposing creature attacks must be directed towards the creature with Taunt.">Taunt</abbr>
keywords.First Strike: <abbr title="This creature has attack priority and deals damage before the enemy in combat.">First Strike</abbr>
keywords.Deadeye: <abbr title="This creature can always hit opponents, regardless of effects or immunities.">Deadeye</abbr>
keywords.Squad Tactics: <abbr title="When this creature defeats an opponent's creature in combat, the owner of the defeated card takes 1 lifeshard of damage from combat.">Squad Tactics</abbr>
keywords.Immunity: <abbr title="The creature cannot be affected by card effects or combat of its immunity type. This includes both friendly and opposing effects.">Immunity</abbr>
keywords.Fury: <abbr title="The creature must attack at every possibility.">Fury</abbr>
keywords.Blocker: <abbr title="The creature cannot declare attacks, but can defend.">Blocker</abbr>
keywords.Hivemind: <abbr title="The creature enters combat with a hivemind token on it. The first time this card would take damage, remove that token instead. This does not apply to instant removal effects, only points of damage.">Hivemind</abbr>
keywords.Clockwork: <abbr title="The creature can copy a single keyword on another creature on the field, until they lose the Clockwork keyword or leave the field.">Clockwork</abbr>
